properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 1 at 3:20PM EST until March 4 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 5 to 8 ft expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...From 2 PM Monday to noon EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MONDAY TO NOON EST WEDNESDAY
